title: Having a go: a look at small business in Australia
creator_credit: Richard Cassidy, Tony Coyte, Australia. Dept. of Industry and Commerce and Film Australia
brief_description: Presents interviews with entrepreneurs from five successful small Australian businesses. Each provides advice on how to succeed while stressing the need to be fully informed and equipped with proper business skills. Highlights the importance of government sponsored small business agencies for providing information and training.
